item.title: Best/Useful Android Apps
item.author: mmazharhussainkgb1145@gmail.com (Mazhar Hussain)
item.description: 1. Eyecon This app lets you know who is calling you even if you don’t have their number saved. Sometimes, it can even show their picture. But a very important feature of this app is that sometimes, it can detect if the caller is a spammer. It can also show quotes from different famous people after every call. Click here to Install 2. Equilizer FX Equalizer FX
item.dc:creator: Mazhar Hussain
